00023 #include "BaseMacLayer.h"
00024 #include "MacControlInfo.h"
00025 #include "SimpleAddress.h"

00027 #include <cassert>

00029 Define_Module(BaseMacLayer);
00030 
00036 void BaseMacLayer::initialize(int stage)
00037 {
00038     BaseLayer::initialize(stage);
00039     if(stage==0) {
00040       // get handle to phy layer
00041         phy = FindModule<MacToPhyInterface*>::findSubModule(getParentModule());
00042 
00043         headerLength= par("headerLength");
00044 
00045         // The nic id is used as MAC address
00046         myMacAddr = getParentModule()->getId();
00047 
00048         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00055 cPacket* BaseMacLayer::decapsMsg(MacPkt* msg)
00056 {
00057     cPacket *m = msg->decapsulate();
00058     m->setControlInfo(new MacControlInfo(msg->getSrcAddr()));
00059     // delete the macPkt
00060     delete msg;
00061     coreEV << " message decapsulated " << endl;
00062     return m;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00070 MacPkt* BaseMacLayer::encapsMsg(cPacket *netwPkt)
00071 {
00072     MacPkt *pkt = new MacPkt(netwPkt->getName(), netwPkt->getKind());
00073     pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00074 
00075     // copy dest address from the Control Info attached to the network
00076     // message by the network layer
00077     MacControlInfo* cInfo = static_cast<MacControlInfo*>(netwPkt->removeControlInfo());
00078 
00079     coreEV <<"CInfo removed, mac addr="<< cInfo->getNextHopMac()<<endl;
00080     pkt->setDestAddr(cInfo->getNextHopMac());
00081 
00082     //delete the control info
00083     delete cInfo;
00084 
00085     //set the src address to own mac address (nic module getId())
00086     pkt->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00087 
00088     //encapsulate the network packet
00089     pkt->encapsulate(netwPkt);
00090     coreEV <<"pkt encapsulated\n";
00091 
00092     return pkt;
00093 }
00094 
00102 void BaseMacLayer::handleUpperMsg(cMessage *mac)
00103 {
00104   assert(dynamic_cast<cPacket*>(mac));
00105     sendDown(encapsMsg(static_cast<cPacket*>(mac)));
00106 }
00107 
00116 void BaseMacLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg)
00117 {
00118     MacPkt *mac = static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg);
00119     int dest = mac->getDestAddr();
00120     int src = mac->getSrcAddr();
00121 
00122     //only foward to upper layer if message is for me or broadcast
00123     if((dest == myMacAddr) || (dest == L2BROADCAST)) {
00124     coreEV << "message with mac addr " << src
00125          << " for me (dest=" << dest
00126          << ") -> forward packet to upper layer\n";
00127     sendUp(decapsMsg(mac));
00128     }
00129     else{
00130     coreEV << "message with mac addr " << src
00131          << " not for me (dest=" << dest
00132          << ") -> delete (my MAC="<<myMacAddr<<")\n";
00133     delete mac;
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void BaseMacLayer::handleLowerControl(cMessage* msg)
00138 {
00139   switch (msg->getKind())
00140   {
00141     case MacToPhyInterface::TX_OVER:
00142       msg->setKind(TX_OVER);
00143       sendControlUp(msg);
00144       break;
00145     default:
00146       coreEV << "BaseMacLayer does not handle control messages of this type (name was "<<msg->getName()<<")\n";
00147       delete msg;
00148       break;
00149   }
00150 }

00152 Signal* BaseMacLayer::createSignal(simtime_t start, simtime_t length, double power, double bitrate)
00153 {
00154   simtime_t end = start + length;
00155   //create signal with start at current simtime and passed length
00156   Signal* s = new Signal(start, length);
00157 
00158   //create and set tx power mapping
00159   Mapping* txPowerMapping = createConstantMapping(start, end, power);
00160   s->setTransmissionPower(txPowerMapping);
00161 
00162   //create and set bitrate mapping
00163   Mapping* bitrateMapping = createConstantMapping(start, end, bitrate);
00164   s->setBitrate(bitrateMapping);
00165 
00166   return s;
00167 }
00168 
00169 Mapping* BaseMacLayer::createConstantMapping(simtime_t start, simtime_t end, double value)
00170 {
00171   //create mapping over time
00172   Mapping* m = MappingUtils::createMapping(0.0, DimensionSet::timeDomain, Mapping::LINEAR);
00173 
00174   //set position Argument
00175   Argument startPos(start);
00176 
00177   //set mapping at position
00178   m->setValue(startPos, value);
00179 
00180   //set position Argument
00181   Argument endPos(end);
00182 
00183   //set mapping at position
00184   m->setValue(endPos, value);
00185 
00186   return m;
00187 }
00188 
00189 ConstMapping* BaseMacLayer::createSingleFrequencyMapping(simtime_t start,
00190                              simtime_t end,
00191                              double centerFreq,
00192                              double halfBandwidth,
00193                              double value)
00194 {
00195   Mapping* res = MappingUtils::createMapping(0.0, DimensionSet::timeFreqDomain, Mapping::LINEAR);
00196 
00197   Argument pos(DimensionSet::timeFreqDomain);
00198 
00199   pos.setArgValue(Dimension::frequency_static(), centerFreq - halfBandwidth);
00200   pos.setTime(start);
00201   res->setValue(pos, value);
00202 
00203   pos.setTime(end);
00204   res->setValue(pos, value);
00205 
00206   pos.setArgValue(Dimension::frequency_static(), centerFreq + halfBandwidth);
00207   res->setValue(pos, value);
00208 
00209   pos.setTime(start);
00210   res->setValue(pos, value);
00211 
00212   return res;
00213 }
